doc.previous: At a 2005 blogger conference in Berlin, MÃ¶ller gave a lecture on the Open Source Initiative, free knowledge and Wikinews, discussing the latter in the context of other models used by Slashdot, Kuro5hin, Daily Kos and others.[17] At an Austrian conference on wikis in Vienna in 2005, MÃ¶ller discussed the advantages of using wikis to compile statistical data, stating that wikis encourage internal transparency and greater participation among coworkers.[18]
